isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, AND 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - FENDERS

note.para: Each fender may be removed and installed separately.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Optional Butterfly Hood - Remove

step1.para: Release the hood latches on the left side of the hood and raise the left side hood panel.
To remove the fender and splash panel, use the following procedures (the left side fender assembly is shown in the following procedures and figures).
Disconnect headlight and directional light wiring to fender assembly being removed.
Refer to Figure 60 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

Remove 3 hex head bolts (Item 1) and hex lock nuts (Item 2, View A-A) with flat washers, rubber spacer, springs and hardened flat washers (Items 3 thru 6, View A-A) from the fender support bracket (Item 7) and the fender support angle (Item 8) on the front of the fender (Item 9).
Refer to Figure 61 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

Remove 3 flange hex head bolts (Item 1) and flange hex lock nuts (Item 2) from the fender and the rear fender support (Items 3 and 4). This will allow the fender and splash panel assembly (Item 3 and 6) to be removed from the vehicle, and the mud flap assembly (Item 5) to be removed from the rear of the fender.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 62 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To separate the fender and splash panel assembly (Item 1 and 2), remove the rear fender channel (Item 3) under the fender.

Remove 5 hex head bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 4), 3 from the fender and 2 from the splash panel, and remove the rear fender channel (Item 3) from the fender and splash panel (Items 1 and 2).
Remove 4 hex head bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 5) on the top flange of the fender and splash panel assembly (Items 1 and 2).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 63 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Also remove 2 hex head bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 1) on the front flange of the fender and splash panel assembly (Items 2 and 3).

Remove 2 hex head bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 4) from the fender reinforcement (Item 5) and splash panel (Item 3), and separate the fender (Item 1, Figure 64) from the splash panel (Item 2, Figure 64).
Repeat this procedure to remove and disassemble the right side fender and splash panel assembly.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Optional Butterfly Hood - Install

step1.para: Position the fender (Item 1, Figure 64) and splash panel (Item 2, Figure 64) together, then install the 2 hex head bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 4, Figure 63) securing the fender reinforcement (Item 5, Figure 63) to the splash panel (Item 3, Figure 63). Tighten finger tight.
Install the 2 hex head bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 1, Figure 63) on the front flange of the fender and splash panel assembly (Items 2 and 3, Figure 63). Tighten finger tight.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 62 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Also install the 4 hex head bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 5) on the top flange of the fender and splash panel assembly (Items 1 and 2). Tighten finger tight.

Position the rear fender channel (Item 3) in place under the fender and splash panel (Items 1 and 2) and install the 5 hex head bolts (Item 4) from the top of the fender and splash panel through the rear fender channel, then from under the fender, install the flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 4) and tighten.
Tighten the hex head bolts and hex lock nuts (Item 5, Figure 62 and Items 1 and 4, Figure 63) securing the fender and splash panel and fender reinforcement together.

Position the fender support angle (Item 8, Figure 60) on the front of the fender, on top of the fender support bracket (Item 7, Figure 60), then position the fender and splash panel assembly (Items 3 and 6, Figure 61) and mud flap assembly (Item 5, Figure 61) in place at the rear fender support (Item 4, Figure 61). Install the 3 flange hex head bolts (Item 1, Figure 61) from outside the fender through the rear fender support, fender and mud flap assembly (Items 4, 3, and 5, Figure 61), then install the flange hex lock nuts (Item 2, Figure 61). Tighten finger tight.
Refer to Figure 60 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

Install the 3 hex head bolts (Item 1) and flat washers (Item 3, View A-A) through the fender support angle, rubber spacer (positioned between the fender support angle and fender support bracket) and fender support bracket (Items 8, 4, and 7, View A-A), then install from under the fender support bracket the springs, hardened flat washers and hex lock nuts (Items 5, 6, and 2, View A-A). Tighten the 3 hex head bolts and hex lock nuts (Items 1 and 2, View A-A) until the lock nut bottoms out against the end of the threads of the bolt.
Connect headlight and directional light wiring to fender assembly being installed.
Lower the left side hood panel and latch the hood latches.
Repeat this procedure to assemble and install the right side fender and splash panel assembly.

figure.caption: Figure 61. 5000 SBA Fender Support and Mud Flap Assembly
Figure 62. 5000 SBA Splash Panel and Rear Fender Channel

calloutgroup.callout1: 4. HEX HEAD BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT
5. HEX HEAD BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT

figure.caption: Figure 63. 5000 SBA Fender and Fender Reinforcement

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX HEAD BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT
4. HEX HEAD BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT

figure.caption: Figure 64. 5000 SBA Fender and Splash Panel
